title: Out Now: Lichtspielhaus Handmade
content:
Lichtspielhaus Handmade is an ultra condensed handwritten typeface based on Lichtspielhaus.  
 Influenced by the hand-painted signs on cinema facades of the early cinema days, Lichtspielhaus Handmade comes with 4 weights.

“Lichtspielhaus Handmade” is the second part of a Type Noir Quadrilogy.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/showing00.jpg)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031im_/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/img/showings/lichtspielhaus/jpg/small/showing11.jpg)

You can get it at [Lichtspielhaus3D.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031/http:/lichtspielhaus3d.com/) and [Myfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031/http:/http/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/lichtspielhaus-handmade) for a special introduction offer.
author: Typocalypse-Now

comments.content:
Nice! The handmade effect is particularly convincing in the heavier weights.

Your MyFonts link is messed up, btw.

Really awesome work. Brilliant presentation as well.

I would remove the dark spots in M, N and W though. The fact that they're darker than other characters is rather obtrusive.
Fun and easy to read - always a good things with funky faces.

Thank you guys for the feedback!  
There will be an update with the removed dark spots.

Aw! Yeah and the link should be  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/lichtspielhaus-handmade](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typocalypse/lichtspielhaus-handmade)

It seems to have a mix up with the number 6 and the letter G. At my own, the number 6 should be the opposite of the number 9. The darker weight show this problem more clearly.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143031im_/http:/typophile.com/files/69CG_6633.png)

Thanks Sim, true! you’re right!  
We’ll put this on the update list.
